campaigncartographer:ModDescription: Adds multiple Cartography related features to the game, such as custom waypoint icons, GPS, auto waypoint markers, and more.
campaigncartographer:error-messages.feat: This feature is not available from the client. Please use the equivalent server command instead.
campaigncartographer:error-messages.mod-: Waypoint Extensions is not installed on the Server. Please ask your server administrator to install the Waypoint Extensions on the server, for added functionality.
campaigncartographer:error-messages.feat: The server administrator has disabled this feature.
